description: urlscan.io is a critical tool for OSINT investigations due to its ability to provide detailed, automated analysis of websites and URLs. By offering insights into the behavior, structure, and connections of websites, it helps investigators uncover hidden relationships, detect threats, and maintain operational security. The metrics provided by urlscan.io are not only technical but also actionable, enabling investigators to piece together broader narratives in cybersecurity, fraud detection, and other OSINT-driven fields.
label: Url Scan IO
